Main.GetAllObjects2FileCommand: SELECT name,xtype,crdate FROM sysobjects WITH (nolock) WHERE xtype IN ('U','P','FN','V','TF') ORDER BY xtype,name
Main.GetGrants: select  princ.name,princ.type_desc,perm.permission_name,perm.state_desc,perm.class_desc,object_name(perm.major_id) AS objectName from sys.database_principals princ left join sys.database_permissions perm on      perm.grantee_principal_id = princ.principal_id

Servers.Name: Server1
Servers.ConStr: workstation id=sqlscm;packet size=4096;user id=user;data source=srv1;persist security info=False;password=pwd

Servers.Name: Server2
Servers.ConStr: workstation id=sqlscm;packet size=4096;user id=user;data source=srv2;persist security info=False;password=pwd
